data.title: Garrick Fincham on LinkedIn: Price of Starlight: Nine short stories
data.meta_description:
https://lnkd.in/eAH3ZmVN

Thirty years in the making, published in magazines across the US and UK. Price of Starlight - now available for ¬£1.99, free on Kindle‚Ä¶
data.text:
üéôüÜïIt's #Mars today, while you work, rest or play! üÜïüéô Episode 60 of the Eastern Promise #podcast is here, with an interstellar insight into the manifold wonders of the #eastofengland! Listen here now: ‚û°Ô∏èApple: https://lnkd.in/eZh_h-yJ ‚û°Ô∏èSpotify: https://lnkd.in/e-Y7Ew9p ‚û°Ô∏èMP3: https://lnkd.in/ePEB-3Uy This week, I'm talking to #Norfolk #sciencefiction author Dr Garrick Fincham about his novel 'Interchange', his day job at the University of East Anglia using #data and #ai, his training as an #archaeologist and how all that combined to produce a novel that reviewers have called "dystopian world-building at its best". But that's not all, as Yoda would say: two very special gifts there are for Eastern Promise listeners... First, with Garrick's blessing I've adapted one of his short stories set in the Interchange #universe, 'Storm Damage' into a dramatised audiobook. It's available on the Eastern Promise podcast feed or here: ‚û°Ô∏èApple: https://lnkd.in/eXJymgqm ‚û°Ô∏èSpotify: https://lnkd.in/etnTKFRj ‚û°Ô∏èMP3: https://lnkd.in/ekU5xGtC (Authors: If you'd like an #audiobook made of your work(s), any genre, get in touch via DM or mike@easternpromise.site) Second: #kindle readers can for a LIMITED TIME ONLY, get a copy of Interchange #FREE from that well-known e-commerce site named after a South American river (OK, Amazon): https://lnkd.in/efGySAra Eastern Promise salutes you, sir! Please also note the advertisement about advertising! Contact mike@easternpromise.site to find out more! You can't beat Eastern Promise for access to senior director-level professionals across the #eastofengland... We head to Adastral Park for the Norfolk & Suffolk Unlimited Connected Innovation conference and the launch (üöÄ pun intended - ALWAYS!) of Space East, our own #spacecluster led by our very own Major Tom, Stuart Catchpole. We'll also hear from Chair of the New Anglia Local Enterprise Partnership #innovation board, Johnathan Reynolds, Will Davies of the UK Satellite Cluster, Professor Gerard Parr MBE of the University of East Anglia, Neil Griffin, Kathryn White and Kelly Boosey of Oxford Innovation and the host with the most, Tim Robinson of Tech East. All that, plus #Crowdsourcery takes in your #bankholiday activities! Why listen to anything else? James Lee Burgess FRSA - Hayley Mace Chart.PR - Chris Starkie - James Allen - Megan Dennis - Roz Bird - Lucy Mowatt DipCIM - Alice Whitney - Alex Howard - Brian Bush - Prof. Ben Garrod - Kevin Keable - Richard Powell OBE CEnv - Richard Balls - Michelle Chambers - Penny Hundleby PhD, FRSB - Penny Bartram - John Gordon-Saker - Alistair Moir - Jack Weaver - Beth Sowersby #university #job #phd #solarsystem #astrophysics

It‚Äôs been a singular honour that Garrick Fincham trusted me enough with his #interchange sandbox to let me turn ‚ÄòStorm Damage‚Äô, his short story set on Mars, into a dramatized #audiobook with #sfx and #music, and read by me. It was a therefore a labour of love twice over, one I would happily repeat for Garrick or work with another author. I won‚Äôt deny seeing the ‚ÄòE‚Äô rating for fruity language gives me a bit of a thrill! Sorry, mother‚Ä¶ Please give ‚ÄòStorm Damage‚Äô a listen, especially if you‚Äôre a #sciencefiction and/or an #audiobook fan. Robert Ashton - Kevin Keable - Alice Whitney - Kelly Boosey - Joshua Davies - Barnaby Cook - Emma Outten üë©üèªüíª - Erika Clegg DL - Diana Hare - Denise Coates - National Centre for Writing - Aston Howe - Beth Miller - Gavin Spoors - Robin Milton - Henry Hoffman - Richard Balls - Rich Wood - Hayley Johnson - Joshua Davies - Asa B. - Oscar Clark - Frontier Developments - Jagex
